flowRoot.flowPara: SELinux stopped plugin_container to access name_bind on port 5795/tcp
If you want to use the plugin package: You must turn off SELinux controls on the Firefox plugins.
Allow httpd to read home directories
If you want to allow system to run with NIS: You must tell SELinux about this by enabling the nis_enabled boolean.
Allow httpd to read home directories
SELinux stopped plugin_container to access name_bind on port 5795/tcp
If you want to allow mozilla plugin domain to bind unreserved tcp/udp ports: You must tell SELinux about this by enabling the mozilla_bind...
Allow httpd to read home directories
If you want to allow mozilla plugin to use Bluejeans: You must tell SELinux about this by enabling the mozilla_bind...
Allow httpd to read home directories
